author: amaltaro
body:
Remove very old CherryPy specs (3.x version) that are longer not used (and their patches).

CherryPy 5.x (cherrypy.spec) should be removed too, but we need services like CRAB and DBS to migrate to the latest version (py2-cherrypy) made available a year or two ago...
title: remove unused cherrypy specs and patches
